full_summary:
# Tender Announcement: Nutanix Hardware and Software Maintenance and Support for SSC

## Contract Details:
* **Notice Title:** SSC BPM018035
* **Solicitation Reference:** BPM018035/21642
* **Contracting Entity:** Shared Services Canada (SSC)
* **Location:** Ottawa, Ontario, Canada
* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive Bidding

## Contract Description:
Shared Services Canada (SSC) is seeking a vendor to provide Nutanix hardware and software maintenance and support services for a period of six months, commencing from December 17, 2022, to December 16, 2023. The contract will be retroactive to the commencement date.

## Competitive Bid:
The bid must comply with the requirements of the solicitation to be considered responsive. The responsive bid with the lowest evaluated price will be recommended for award.

## Contact Information:
* **Procurement Officer:** Agnes Kowalska
* **Contact Email:** agnes.kowalska2@ssc-spc.gc.ca
* **Contact Phone:** 343-551-9034
* **Contact Address:** Data Centers and Internal Services, Shared Services Canada, 180 Kent Street, 13 Floor, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0H4

## Bid Submission:
Due to the COVID-19 pandemic, suppliers are required to submit bids electronically via the contracting authority's email.

## List of Documents:
* https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/98F0DD88-D860-4733-99EA-C3A05D64432D
* https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/ECD5ED05-86D6-44D9-8071-60275210ADB1

## RFP Document:
The RFP document provides complete details regarding this requirement, including mandatory criteria, evaluation criteria, and basis of selection. Suppliers are required to submit pricing in accordance with Annex A – List of Deliverables and Pricing.

## Closing Date:
February 9, 2023, at 2:00 PM Eastern Time.
